_header: Seven kingdoms within this land sometime there were
Subjects: Etheldreda, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Etheldreda — in quatrains

BLCottFausBIII.First Lines:
[S]Euene kyndamus with inne þis lond some tyme þer
                    wereAnd seuene kyng[ys] with inne þer regnede also…
BLCottFausBIII.Last Lines:
…But whenne he say hys cuncel wuld not consenteTo fasth
                    þat mayde aȝene fro hure abbay…
BLCottFausBIII.Note:
Ends imperfectly. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.
BLCottFausBIII.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 282-307.
